page.title: 01RADSTOCK AND DISTRICT
page.content: These two pages are to give the over all look of our D.Block which we surveyed. The houses in our D.Block are mostly made of stone,there are not very many red brick houses.There are quite alot of miners cottages especially in Radstock,and many of them,people are still living in,from the mines which are'nt used now.Most of the houses in our D.Block are in estates and have tile roofs. In our D.Block we have a market which opens every Friday and Saturday. The market is where people come to sell clothes,furniture,jewellery and food. There are many shops covering our D.Block,but there is only one main shopping centre which is being remodernised. Almost half of our D.Block is
